H0.text: It separates when sugar is combined with water.

H1.text: It dissolves when sugar is combined with water.

H2.text: It floats to the top when sugar is combined with water.

H3.text: It becomes warm when sugar is combined with water.

A4.text: Solutions of sucrose can sit for years with negligible change.

A5.text: Hydrolysis breaks the glycosidic bond converting sucrose into glucose and fructose.
